show.subtitle: Charlene Spretnak and her guests track the progress of the “Big Make-over,” the cultural and political Relational Shift that is occurring in all fields as a result of recent discoveries that life is far more dynamically interrelated than modern societies have realized.
show.title: All Together Now

title: All Together Now
content: Localization and the Economics of Happiness — a talk with Helena Norberg-Hodge, director of the International Society... <!--more--> for Ecology and Culture about locally based alternatives to the global consumer culture; the DVD The Economics of Happiness, which includes “8 Facts about Globalization,” as well as examples of the local and regional rising counterforce to a globalized economy.
